name: Jillian Michaels Fitness Adventure
description: The Games on Demand version supports English & Spanish.   Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  This game requires a Kinect™ Sensor.  Join Jillian Michaels on an interactive adventure and push your body to the limit. Bolt through a lush jungle temple and jump over, duck and dodge obstacles using Jillian’s exercise moves in this new Parkour-style experience. Watch as your living room transforms into ancient ruins and your own personal gym! •        Master 90 scenic predefined circuits and keep your body moving •        Amplify the intensity with fitness equipment or use your own body weight…the choice is yours! •        Personalize your own routines or let Jillian guide you through 10 rigorous circuits •        Track your daily, weekly, monthly or yearly progress of calories burned, time spent and circuits completed •        Share results and achievements through Xbox Live leaderboards
